title: WATCH: January's best showboats in the Premier League
description: Every football fan loves seeing a player provide a moment of inspiration on the pitch be it a fancy flick, a mazy dribble or an ingenious piece of skill.
content: Thankfully for followers of the Premier League, such moments occur virtually every game thanks to the quality of the players in the division.Premier League games came thick and fast throughout January and some of the competition's biggest stars caught the eye with their individual quality, including Paul Pogba, Eden Hazard and Heung-min Son.With that in mind, we've compiled a montage of our favourite skills, flicks and tricks from the Premier League last month for your viewing pleasure!Click play on the video to watch the best showboat moments from the Premier League in January!
